content:
Hi,

Looking at the CLinical Genomic workgroup on FHIR web-site it appears to me that the FHIR-Genomic is still far from beeing at a maturity level that would enable real deployment. The maturity on the use-cases definition and landscape is very high but I can't find reference implementation that are maintained and could be used to envision more robust deployment (the only one I see is on github here (https://github.com/ychen306/FHIR-Genomics) but no change since 3 years.

I'm wondering if any of you may confirm/un-confirm the above statement ....
Any complementary info that would help me assessing the maturity of the standard and the distance toward a mature offering is more than wellcome ...

Regards
The current effort in the genomics space is found here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/
